about_the_game:
Alex’s quiet life in a small, unassuming town begins to unravel as strange and impossible events take hold. Neighbors disappear, buildings shift overnight, and creatures that shouldn’t exist begin to roam the streets. Something sinister is at work, and Alex must uncover the truth before the town—and himself—are consumed by the madness.

Inspired by classics like Silent Hill and System Shock, Incoherence is a survival exploration game set in a sprawling, open-world town. Scavenge for resources, craft tools, and uncover clues to navigate a reality that seems to bend and break with each passing moment. As Alex pieces together the fragments of this eerie mystery, he must confront the terrifying connection between himself and the forces at play.

In a world where reality itself is the enemy, the answers may come at a cost Alex isn’t prepared to pay.

Key Features

  • Immerse yourself in a first-person adventure, rich in detail and atmosphere.

  • Equip a variety of classic weapons, each with unique strengths and abilities.

  • Interact with complex NPCs, adding depth to the unfolding story.

  • Encounter diverse monsters, testing your combat skills and strategies.

  • Evolve your character through RPG elements, with leveling and skill trees.

  • Tailor your arsenal with weapon upgrades to suit your playstyle.

  • Unearth blueprints and use found materials to craft vital resources.

  • Explore computer systems and find notes that piece together the game's narrative and open new pathways.

  • Overcome challenges by repairing and hacking robots and security systems.

  • Collect in-game currency scattered throughout the world for use at various vendors.
